data.text: @mailandguardian #dudula is another ripe unrest,for whole of RSA🧐The government can't choose foreigners over of its  people🇿🇦.Having them(foreigners) on job 'lists' while the majority of South Africans are unemployed. The 'media' will call this "governments disloyalty",xenophobia,vigilantism,ect https://t.co/aeZzg2EU92

@mailandguardian I have been seeing post everywhere and a lot of people keep saying reach out to her, reach out to her and eventually I did and it turned out to be legit I invested $1000 and received $7,500 in 7days @earnwithCamrinn

@mailandguardian When I lost my job, I thought I have lost it all. With the little cash of R3000 I got R11,300 with her may not know that he saved my life, I thank you so so much Ma`am for your help in my life @earnwithCamrinn

@mailandguardian Couple of months ago I came across a recommendation about @Arnoldnike93 wealth how he helped investors to earn lots of money with their investments. and I decided to give a trial with the little I have. Now my little has turned into something great which was not my expectation
